definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by re-inspection.
sentences.chinese: 經再次檢驗發現貴方裝運的貨物重量短缺了。

sentences.english: I wonder if this date wuld be suitable for you?
sentences.chinese: 這樣日期貴方覺得合適嗎？

sentences.english: An early reply would help us to help you.
sentences.chinese: 早速回函將有助於本公司服務貴方。

sentences.english: We thank you for your consideration in making us the consignment of 30 bales of cotton goods.
sentences.chinese: 貴方欲委託敝公司銷售棉織品30包，我方不勝感激。

sentences.english: Please let us know what the full quantity of your order is.
sentences.chinese: 請惠知本公司貴方訂單的總數。

sentences.english: Your cooperate is returning the enclosed form promptly would be much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 我公司將非常感謝貴方早日寄回信內所附的表格。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss with you our agency of your electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 我想同貴方商談你們電電扇的署理問題。

sentences.english: We would like to receive additional information about your haut couture Autumn Collection.
sentences.chinese: 希望貴方提供秋季系列女裝的進一步資料。

sentences.english: Your letter of 9"September addressed to our Beijing Branch Office has been passed on to us for attention."
sentences.chinese: 貴方9月9日寫給我北京分公司的信已送往我處並閱。

sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by reinspection.
sentences.chinese: 經複驗，發現貴方發送的貨色短重。

sentences.english: We have advised you this morning by fax of our appreciation that this matter has now been settled.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午，我方已發傳真感謝貴方索賠問題已獲解決。

sentences.english: We specialize in audio? visual products, and we express our desire to trade with you in this line.
sentences.chinese: 我們專門生產視聽產品，願與貴方開展這方面的業務。

sentences.english: We note that you want additional samples of 5 yards per color way to be dispatched by air.
sentences.chinese: 獲悉貴方另要求航寄色位各5碼樣品，這是可以的。

sentences.english: We trust you can meet our requirements.
sentences.chinese: 相信貴方能滿足我們的要求。

sentences.english: It would help us greatly if you would accept D/A.
sentences.chinese: 若貴方能接收承兌交單方式付款，則兌偶方幫忙很大。

sentences.english: On reinspection, we found that the quality of your shipment does not meet the contract standard.
sentences.chinese: 複檢，我們發現貴方交貨質量達不到合同規定標準。

definition: Takeshima (Korean Dokdo 獨島|独岛[Du2 dao3]), disputed islands in Sea of Japan
honorific (e.g. in grammar of oriental languages)
cap badge (official sign of rank in Qing dynasty)
to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
